duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise store personnel in all store activities, maintain store policy and procedures under the supervision of Store Management.
Measure female consumers to determine proper fit for bras and various other undergarments and intimate apparel in the privacy of the women’s fitting room on a regular basis.
Assist in planning store payroll and financial budget.
Maintain accurate records and control expenses to achieve budget objectives while ensuring adequate staffing.
Recruit, select and train store staff.
Assist on the sales floor as needed, including cashiering and waiting on customers.

education_certification.credential: High school degree/GED or a combination of education and retail management experience. College degree is preferred.
